p: Drainage areas for streamflow gauges range from 4 to 1,847,181 km 2, median streamflow discharge ranges from 0.0 to 7,362 m 3/s, and median water yield ranges from 0.0 to 12.9 mm/d. For the natural streamflow gauges (570 in total), drainage areas range from 4 to 25,791 km 2, median streamflow discharge ranges from 0.0 to 106 m 3/s, and median water yield ranges from 0.001 to 6.8 mm/d. All analyses use daily water yield (in millimeters per day) separated into water years (October 1 through September 30).
